meanings.sent1: The cost of the school trip was defrayable for all students.
meanings.sent2: The defrayable expenses were within the budget.
meanings.sent3: The defrayable bill made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her defrayable offer was like a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The defrayable nature of the project made it a success.

meanings.definition: Able to be paid or covered.
meanings.sent1: The defrayable amount was manageable for the family.
meanings.sent2: The defrayable fee was due at the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: The defrayable price tag was surprisingly low.
meanings.sent4: His defrayable debt weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The defrayable cost was worth every penny.
